response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to both parties, as it is worth $800,000 to you. Considering its unparalleled quality and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an outstanding opportunity to secure this masterpiece at a highly favorable rate. I look forward to your positive response and the chance to discuss the details further.", "product_price": 750000}
